title: Spider-Man: The Amazing Adventures
description: Follow the incredible adventures of Spider-Man as he battles supervillains and protects New York City.
author: Stan Lee

title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns
description: Experience the dark and gritty world of Gotham City as Batman comes out of retirement to fight crime once again.
author: Frank Miller

title: Wonder Woman: The Amazon Princess
description: Discover the origins and heroic deeds of Wonder Woman, the Amazonian princess and superhero.
author: George Perez

title: X-Men: The Dark Phoenix Saga
description: Witness the rise of the powerful Phoenix and its impact on the mutant superhero team, the X-Men.
author: Chris Claremont

title: Guardians of the Galaxy: Cosmic Adventures
description: Join Star-Lord and his ragtag team as they protect the galaxy from cosmic threats and dance to classic tunes.
author: Brian Michael Bendis

title: The Flash: The Scarlet Speedster
description: Join Barry Allen, the Fastest Man Alive, as he battles criminals and metahuman threats in Central City.
author: Geoff Johns

title: Deadpool: Merc with a Mouth
description: Laugh and fight alongside the Merc with a Mouth, Deadpool, in this outrageous comic series.
author: Victor Gischler

title: Superman: Man of Steel
description: Follow the adventures of Superman as he protects Metropolis and fights against supervillains.
author: John Byrne

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: Enter the magical world of Hogwarts and join Harry, Ron, and Hermione in their first-year adventures.
author: J.K. Rowling

title: Spider-Man: Web of Shadows
description: Join Spider-Man in a web-slinging adventure through New York City as he battles iconic villains.
author: Dan Slott

title: The Flash: Born to Run
description: Discover the origin and adventures of Wally West as he becomes the speedster known as The Flash.
author: Mark Waid

title: The Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes
description: Witness the formation of The Avengers and their battles against powerful foes in this epic series.
author: Kurt Busiek

title: Superman: Red Son
description: Explore an alternate history where Superman's rocket lands in the Soviet Union, changing the world's destiny.
author: Mark Millar

title: Guardians of the Galaxy: Annihilation Conquest
description: Join Star-Lord and his team as they face the Annihilation Wave, a cosmic threat that endangers the universe.
author: Dan Abnett

title: Batman: The Killing Joke
description: Delve into the dark and tragic past of The Joker as he attempts to break Commissioner Gordon's sanity.
author: Alan Moore

title: Doctor Strange: The Oath
description: Follow Doctor Strange's journey to uncover a powerful and mysterious elixir while battling dark forces.
author: Brian K. Vaughan

title: Aquaman: Throne of Atlantis
description: Dive into the depths of Atlantis as Aquaman must protect his underwater kingdom from an impending war.
author: Geoff Johns

title: Iron Man: Extremis
description: Tony Stark confronts a new kind of threat when the experimental Extremis technology falls into the wrong hands.
author: Warren Ellis

title: Green Lantern: Rebirth
description: Discover the rebirth of Hal Jordan as he reclaims his role as a Green Lantern and faces a cosmic conspiracy.
author: Geoff Johns

title: The Amazing Spider-Man
description: Follow Peter Parker's life as he balances being a high school student and a superhero, Spider-Man.
author: Stan Lee

title: Justice League: Origin
description: Witness the formation of the Justice League as Earth faces an otherworldly invasion.
author: Geoff Johns

title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
description: Travel to a dystopian future where mutants are hunted, and the X-Men must change the past to save the world.
author: Chris Claremont

title: Wonder Woman: Rebirth
description: Follow Wonder Woman's journey as she uncovers the truth about her past and her role as an Amazonian warrior.
author: Greg Rucka

title: Fantastic Four: The End Is Fourever
description: Join the Fantastic Four as they face their most formidable foes and the ultimate threat to Earth.
author: James Robinson

title: Aquaman: The Trench
description: Witness Aquaman's first solo adventure as he confronts the monstrous Trench dwelling in the ocean's depths.
author: Geoff Johns

title: Iron Man: Extremis
description: Tony Stark confronts a new kind of threat when the experimental Extremis technology falls into the wrong hands.
author: Warren Ellis

title: Green Lantern: Secret Origin
description: Learn how Hal Jordan becomes a Green Lantern and the protector of Sector 2814.
author: Geoff Johns

title: Thor: God of Thunder
description: Follow the thunderous adventures of Thor, the God of Thunder, as he battles cosmic threats and villains.
author: Jason Aaron

title: The Magical Adventures Luna and Max
description: The Magical Adventures of Luna and Max is a delightful children's book about two siblings named Luna and Max, who embark on adventurous journeys to imaginary worlds. Fueled by their boundless imaginations, the siblings use their magical powers to explore enchanted forests, visit exotic lands and meet all kinds of fantastical creatures like dragons, unicorns and giants.
author: Ariya Shahid

title: One Piece, Vol. 1: Romance Dawn
description: As a child, Monkey D. Luffy dreamed of becoming King of the Pirates. But his life changed when he accidentally gained the power to stretch like rubber…at the cost of never being able to swim again! Years, later, Luffy sets off in search of the One Piece, said to be the greatest treasure in the world...
author: Eiichiro Oda

title: Crayon Shin-Chan 4
description: Crayon Shin-Chan 4 is a comic that narrates the hilarious misadventures of Shinnosuke Nohara, a clever and mischievous young boy. Through comical situations at school and at home, Shin-Chan keeps everyone laughing with his irreverent behavior. Created by Yoshito Usui, this series offers fresh and witty humor for readers of all ages. Dive into Shin-Chan's hilarious antics and enjoy moments of guaranteed laughter.
author: Yosito Usui

title: Slam Dunk, Vol. 1
description: Winning isn't everything in the game of basketball, but who wants to come in second? It takes dedication and discipline to be the best, and the Shohoku High hoops team wants to be just that. They have one last year to make their captain's dream of reaching the finals come truewill they do it?. Takehiko Inoue's legendary beloved basketball manga is finally here and the tale of a lifetime is in your hands.
author: Takehiko Inoue

title: Slam Dunk, Vol. 2
description: He may be a pain in the butt, but Hanamichi's athletic prowess and monstrous strength have not gone unnoticed by the captain of Shohoku's judo team. Hoping to take his troupe to a national title, the judo captain is willing to go to great lengths to lure Hanamichi away from the court and get him on the sparring mat. Will out-and-out bribery convince Hanamichi that judo's the way to go, or will he stay a basketball man to the very end?
author: Takehiko Inoue

title: Slam Dunk, Vol. 3
description: For a self-proclaimed genius such as Sakuragi, executing a dazzling slam dunk is no problem at all, but what about some other basketball moves that require a bit more finesse? With the help of Haruka (and some goading from captain Akagi), Sakuragi attempts to put his pride in check and learn how to pull off a basic layup. In theory it should be easy...but sometimes the simplest shots are the toughest to master.
author: Takehiko Inoue

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba, Vol. 1
description: In Taisho-era Japan, kindhearted Tanjiro Kamado makes a living selling charcoal. But his peaceful life is shattered when a demon slaughters his entire family. His little sister Nezuko is the only survivor, but she has been transformed into a demon herself! Tanjiro sets out on a dangerous journey to find a way to return his sister to normal and destroy the demon who ruined his life.
author: Koyoharu Gotouge

title: Dragon Ball (3-in-1 Edition)
description: Dragon Ball introduces a young monkey-tailed boy named Goku (a wry update of the classic Chinese Monkey King legend), whose quiet life changes when he meets a girl named Bulma who is on a quest to collect seven Dragon Balls. If she gathers them all, an incredibly powerful dragon will appear and grant her one wish. But the precious orbs are scattered all over the world, and Bulma could use the help of a certain super-strong boy...
author: Akira Toriyama

title: Dragon Ball Super, Vol. 1
description: Ever since Goku became Earths greatest hero and gathered the seven Dragon Balls to defeat the evil Boo, his life on Earth has grown a little dull. But new threats loom overhead, and Goku and his friends will have to defend the planet once again in this continuation of Akira Toriyamas best-selling series, Dragon Ball!
author: Akira Toriyama

title: Dragon Ball Super, Vol. 10
description: The Tournament of Power is over and Goku and Vegeta have embarked on a new adventure…in space! The Galactic Patrol experiences its worst prison break ever, and the evil Moro—a planet-eating monster—escapes! Moros goal is attaining the Dragon Balls of New Namek, and its up to Goku, Vegeta and the Galactic Patrol to stop him! But how can they do anything when Moro can drain them of their energy just by being near them?!
author: Akira Toriyama

title: Naruto, Vol. 1: Uzumaki Naruto
description: Twelve years ago the Village Hidden in the Leaves was attacked by a fearsome threat. A nine-tailed fox spirit claimed the life of the village leader, the Hokage, and many others. Today, the village is at peace and a troublemaking kid named Naruto is struggling to graduate from Ninja Academy. His goal may be to become the next Hokage, but his true destiny will be much more complicated. The adventure begins now!
author: Masashi Kishimoto

title: Naruto, Vol. 2: The Worst Client
description: Tired of menial tasks, Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura ask for a tougher assignment. But you should always be careful what you wish for! Along with their teacher, Kakashi, the trio must now guard a cranky old man from the Land of the Waves. But Tazuna the bridgebuilder is in more danger than anyone could have imagined. And now the young ninja are too!
author: Masashi Kishimoto

title: Doraemon, Vol.1
description: Doraemon, a cat robot, traveled back in time from the 22nd century to watch over Noby whos a good kid but terrible at sports, never studies, and has an incredible capacity for slacking off. Doraemon tries to help Noby with nice but often unpredictable gadgets from his 4th dimensional pocket as Nobys clumsy and always getting into trouble. Can Doraemon solve the problems and change Nobys fortune for the better?
author: FUJIKO F FUJIO

title: Kimi ni Todoke: From Me to You
description: Sawako Kuronuma is the perfect heroine...for a horror movie. With striking similarities to a haunting movie character--jet-black hair, sinister smile and silent demeanor--she's mistakenly called Sadako by those around her. But behind her scary façade is a very misunderstood teenager. Too shy to fit in, all she wants to do is make some friends. But when the most popular boy in class befriends her, she's sure to make more than just that--she's about to make some enemies too!
author: Karuho Shiina

title: One-Punch Man, Vol. 1
description: Every time a promising villain appears, Saitama beats the snot out of em with one punch! Can he finally find an opponent who can go toe-to-toe with him and give his life some meaning? Or is he doomed to a life of superpowered boredom?
author: Yusuke Murata

title: Jujutsu Kaisen, Ryomen Sukuna
description: Although Yuji Itadori looks like your average teenager, his immense physical strength is something to behold! Every sports club wants him to join, but Itadori would rather hang out with the school outcasts in the Occult Research Club. One day, the club manages to get their hands on a sealed cursed object. Little do they know the terror theyll unleash when they break the seal…
author: Gege Akutami

title: Berserk Volume 1
description: Created by Kentaro Miura, Berserk is manga mayhem to the extreme - violent, horrifying, and mercilessly funny - and the wellspring for the internationally popular anime series. Not for the squeamish or the easily offended, Berserk asks for no quarter - and offers none!. His name is Guts, the Black Swordsman, a feared warrior spoken of only in whispers. Bearer of a gigantic sword, an iron hand, and the scars of countless battles and tortures, his flesh is also indelibly marked with The Brand, an unholy symbol that draws the forces of darkness to him and dooms him as their sacrifice.
author: Kentaro Miura

title: Spy x Family, Vol. 1
description: Not one to depend on others, Twilight has his work cut out for him procuring both a wife and a child for his mission to infiltrate an elite private school. What he doesnt know is that the wife hes chosen is an assassin and the child hes adopted is a telepath!
author: Tatsuya Endo

title: Fruits Basket Collector's Vol. 1
description: After a family tragedy turns her life upside down, plucky high schooler Tohru Honda takes matters into her own hands and moves out...into a tent! Unfortunately for her, she pitches her new home on private land belonging to the mysterious Sohma clan, and it isn't long before the owners discover her secret. But, as Tohru quickly finds out when the family offers to take her in, the Sohmas have a secret of their own--when touched by the opposite sex, they turn into the animals of the Chinese Zodiac!A perennial favorite of fans and librarians alike, Natsuki Takaya's beloved bestselling Fruits Basket series returns to print in gorgeous deluxe English-language omnibus editions with beautiful full-color illustrations that are not to be missed!
author: Natsuki Takaya

title: Case Closed, Vol. 1
description: Precocious high school student Jimmy Kudo uses his keen powers of observation and astute intuition to solve mysteries that have left law enforcement officials baffled. Hot on the trail of a suspect, Jimmy is accosted from behind and fed a strange chemical which physically transforms him into a grade schooler! Taking on the pseudonym Conan Edogawa, he attempts to track down the people who did this to him. But until he finds a cure for his bizarre condition, Jimmy continues to help the police solve their toughest cases.
author: Gosho Aoyama
